metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000211 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Lynx before 2.8.9dev.16 is vulnerable to a use after free in the HTMLparser resulting in memory disclosure, because HTML_put_string() can appenda chunk onto itself.

criterions.comment: lynx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
